contentList.content: Bind Pact Weapon: Melee Main Hand
Bind Pact Weapon: Ranged Main Hand
Bind Pact Weapon: Melee Off Hand
Bind Pact Weapon: Ranged Off Hand
Bind Pact Weapon: Dismiss
Bind Pact Toggle: Melee Main Hand
Bind Pact Toggle: Ranged Main Hand
Bind Pact Toggle: Melee Off Hand
Bind Pact Toggle: Ranged Off Hand
The warlock bound to this weapon is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it. The weapon deals[1] instead of its regular damage.
Bind to your melee main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical and you may have it deal[1],[2] or[3] instead of its regular damage.
Bind to your ranged main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical and you may have it deal[1],[2] or[3] instead of its regular damage.
Bind to your melee off hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical and you may have it deal[1],[2] or[3] instead of its regular damage.
Bind to your ranged off hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical and you may have it deal[1],[2] or[3] instead of its regular damage.

On equip:
While not in combat automatically bind to weapons you equip.
Attacks with your pact weapon deal[1].

Bind to your weapon. Its damage becomes magical and you may have it deal[1], [2] or[3] instead of its regular damage. You cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
Pact Weapon: Necrotic
Pact Weapon: Psychic
Pact Weapon: Radiant
You can only have 1 pact weapon at any time.
Release the bond to your weapon.
No melee weapon equipped.
No ranged weapon equipped.
No off-hand weapon equipped.

You can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PactOfTheBlade">Summon</LSTag> a pact weapon, or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PactOfTheBlade_Bind">Bind</LSTag> the one you are wielding, its damage becomes magical and you may have it deal[1], [2] or[3] instead of its regular damage.
